Documentation

nodeElementType :: HasCallStack => Node -> ExpressionMap -> ET Source #

Helpers functions for Expression nodes

nodeTypeWeight :: HasCallStack => Node -> Int Source #

For ordering things inside Sum or Product so we can write rules like restOfProduct ~* (x +: y) ~* (z +: w) |.~~~~~~> restOfProduct ~* restOfSum ~+ (x +: y) ~+ (u +: v) |.~~~~~~> restOfSum ~+ ((x + u) +: (y + v)) ...
